unnormalised: Urban planning in India needs more focus on sustainability. The Nehruvian vision, while impactful, requires updates. Consider the chaos near Chandni Chowk; better planning could ease traffic woes. Like in the film *'Wake Up Sid'*, our cities need youthful energy and fresh ideas. TERI could offer valuable insights. We must invest more than just Rs. 500 crore; a holistic approach is key for cities to thrive within a 10 km radius. Smart city missions aren't enough.
